name: ONE MONTH IN THE LIFE
description:
by @jekagames

This game is about the period in between when my partner found out that he had been accepted into the RCMP for training and the time that he left.

Made as part of a directed reading course in order to learn Phaser and basic javascript.

You can read a postmortem about the creation of the game here:

http://tag.hexagram.ca/jekagames/platforms-and-programming-one-month-in-the-life-postmortem/
